name: Michael TOMSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, et al, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June, 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
